summary: This mod changes the default moon in Skyrim to the one found in Minecraft.
descriptionHtml:
~Minecraft Moon Version 1.0

~This mod changes the default moon in Skyrim to the one found in Minecraft.


~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder) in your Skyrim folder
4. Start Skyrim, then look up at night!

a. To only change the Masser (big moon), only install the files that start with \"Masser\". If you don\'t want to remove the Secunda (small moon) then don\'t install the files that start with \"Secunda\".


~Uninstallation
1. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod:

a. Data\\textures\\sky\\(Files included in the downloaded folder)


~Incompatibility
This mod should not have any incompatibility issues, other than any other mods that change the moon textures. If anything is found, then please tell me on the comments!


~Known Issues or Bugs
None known. If any are found, please tell me on the comments!


~Change Log
None


~Credits
Credit to Mojang for creating the Minecraft game.


~LoganZezima
author: LoganZezima
